body:
spack provide a large repository of packages going from system tools all the way up to complex applications.

Many useful system tools are already in the builtin repo of spack.

Would it be possible to add a package that provides "man" ?

```

[sfux@develop01 ~]$ rpm -qf /usr/bin/man
man-1.6f-39.el6.x86_64
```
title: spack package for man pages would be cool
